= 2. What Autumn Has =
Autumn has one library and some head files. Also you can compile Autumn framework source file with your application source file together and not using library because Autumn is a open source project.
== 2.1. Library ==
Autumn has one library, two file, AutumnFramework.lib for compiling and AutumnFramework.dll for running. If you use Autumn's head file, you should link this library when compile your application.
== 2.2. Head files ==
Now Autumn has 4 head files in _include_ directory: _IBeanWrapper.h_, _BeanWrapperMacro.h_, _IBeanFactory.h_ and _IBasicType.h_.
